body.p:
The Occident is at hand and I find
that I shall have to wait for the October No. before
my reply comes forth. You are the best judge in
these matters but it seems to me that provided you had
the time to get it up it would have been better if it had
appeared at the same time as “O”=however you know
best and it might have meditated? against you as a
journalist altho it is a query wither a proprietor of
a paper should allow a libellious article to appear
when he knows before hand that it is a libel—

I have no copy of the refutation I sent you. Will
you oblige me with a proof at your earliest convenience.
If I had had more time I could have answered on several
other points, which I think you might introduce into
your note or remarks—viz “C” starts with the intention
1st of going by the “record”...—he had the same opptunity of
referring to the record as I had—yet he does not bring
it forward as proof of his assertions,—he positively deceives
you into publishing a libel on me. I bring the record

2nd Elements of Jewish faith is a deception should
have been Elements of Poznanskis faithessness”

3rd S.N.C neither painted beautiful pictures
or portraits of from imagination, he only gave prevented
a daguerreotype verso of things as they really are

4 C refers to the Trustees for the truth of his assertion
about the creed—and says the Prest Mr Olloing ?

at that time was on the committee this is false
Mr. O. was not, the board consisted of

Abraham Moise, and Isaih Moses, and at
that time no reform was thought of, with the
exception of the organ—Poznanski ought to have
made a reform “ten Commandments,” at same time
“Extract of a letter from Poznanski to Dr. Eckman
dated Charleston Apl 29. 5610

“The doctrine of a personal Messiah is generally
regarded as unfounded by our congregation and as a sound of evil
to the Jewish Nation.”

This goes to prove that “C” makes a fool
of himself when he speaks of Dr. E. touching gratuitously
on the vital principle of the Messiah, or that it
is done to deceive the unwary. You can use the
quotation above. I copied it from the Original.—

C was told (the day the Proof was recd) by Mr. Moise
and Mr Valentine that his assertions were false
that S N C could bring Documents to prove his assertions.
Yet he did not suppress it altho he had two
weeks to do it in, — and the records to examine or refer to,
the result has been that the Jewish
party have ceased going to Synagogue as the
creed a la Piznasty—is sh? in the walls—
yesterday Dr E had 4 members in Synagogue.

your remarks are the admiration of every body
you hail “C” as a firm believer in the faith”
Mr N Levin told me he could prove by s?e gentleman
that Isaac Cardoza exposed himself before him and
the s?e persons that he did not believe in the bible”
—this is nothing to me but Mr C. better take care
how he becomes personal, he lives in open concubinage
with a mullato woman by whom he had six
illegitimate children, and to this day is running
after colored girls—it is shameful for such a
man to insinuate about professors of Religion
going into p? of vice—

I wrote you requesting as a favor that you
would reply immediately to me but I suppose
business prevented?—if you can manage to
send me an early poof proof I would feel much
obliged as it might require some alteration
or amendment—give my kind regards to
S. S. and family.

The article of Mr Wise is impertinent
in the extreme—he has proved himself a
rain man. 20 years hence, the world will
become so enlightened that he will get justice
done him—in mean time let us consign
him to obscurity.

P. S. Please expunge from Dr Eckmans letter
to you the sentence about founders of the
congregation. let it only speak of the Conversation
between P & Dr. E.—you will arrange it so
that it reads correctly—and any improvement
you wish to make in mine you Bar F have
my permission. Dr. E. request me to
say that he wished the above sentence erased.

p.del:
I give the report of the following in Dr. E own words
Last year after Kipur when at the time Dr
E. Denounced Poz as greatly of infidelity & hypocritiscy? his friends
wanted satisfaction, and called and prepared a paper stating
that the Rev S Poznanski believed in the bible and
they obtained about 25 signatures to it.—Dr. E.
friends wanted that he should to make compose matters
also give Mr P a ? paper to the purpose that Dr E should take P word that he believe in the bible but he refused
—this goes to prove that such a denouncement
took place. which “C” Denies,—or why should
it be necessary for Mr P. to obtain a certificate that
he believes in the bible.—how is it possible
for any body to know what I believe?
